sentences.en: Alternatively, a reflective type of adhesive containing aluminium powder may be used.
sentences.cn: 此外, 也可采用含有铝粉的反射型粘接剂.

sentences.en: Characteristic This product is yellowish - brown piece of adhesive plaster with aromatic smell.
sentences.cn: 本品为黄褐色的片状贴膏剂,气芬香.

sentences.en: Cut a large number of strips of adhesive plaster before beginning.
sentences.cn: 开始之前,先剪好许多胶布条.

sentences.en: For a good bond, an adhesive must counteract the effect of surface roughness and boundary layers.
sentences.cn: 为了取得很好的粘结, 粘结剂必须能克服表面粗糙和边界层的反应.

sentences.en: He put on a pad of gauze and a strip of adhesive tape over the wound.
sentences.cn: 他在伤口上贴了一块纱布再加一条橡皮膏.

sentences.en: Note that all edges have been petaled with adhesive.
sentences.cn: 注意所有边缘都有胶布做瓣.

sentences.en: The first requirement for any adhesive bond is that the adhesive most wet the substrate.
sentences.cn: 对所有粘结剂粘结的首先要求,就是必须能浸润基材.

sentences.en: The specimens were made from two glass arms joined with a 0.005 - in. layer of epoxy adhesive.
sentences.cn: 制作的试样是把两块玻璃臂用 0.005时 厚环氧粘合剂涂层胶合成的.

sentences.en: Thic coat serves as an adhesive between cells and as a protective layer.
sentences.cn: 这一层负责细胞间的连接,并作为细胞的保护层.

sentences.en: This adhesive must be applied to both surfaces which are to be bonded together.
sentences.cn: 要粘接的两个面都必须涂上这种黏合剂.

sentences.en: Use a good waterproof adhesive in addition to the screws.
sentences.cn: 除了螺钉外,还要用优质防水黏合剂.

sentences.en: Use vinyl seam adhesive where vinyls overlap.
sentences.cn: 塑料布相叠处用塑料封口胶粘起来。

sentences.en: Would you give me an adhesive stamp?
sentences.cn: 请给我一枚带胶邮票好 吗 ?

sentences.en: You need a strong adhesive to bond wood to metal.
sentences.cn: 需要强力胶才能把木料粘在金属上.

sentences.en: You'll need a strong adhesive to mend that chair.
sentences.cn: 你需要一种粘性很强的东西来修理那把椅子.

phrases.tran_cn: 附着能力；粘着能力；粘附能力
环氧胶粘剂；环氧尸粘合剂
环氧树脂胶；二合一黏合剂
n. 热熔胶；热熔性胶粘剂
压敏粘着剂；压感胶粘剂；压敏型黏合剂

trans.tran_en: An adhesive substance is able to stick firmly to something else
a substance such as glue that you use to stick two things together
